title.rendered: Team Vistara celebrates the 90th anniversary of Mr. JRD Tata’s maiden flight

content.rendered:
Team Vistara celebrated the 90th anniversary of Mr. JRD Tata’s maiden flight by sharing their world with our children and helping them experience the ‘new feeling’ aboard the Delhi-Amritsar-Delhi flight followed by a visit to the Taj Swarna in Amritsar.

The children were excited about their first-time flight experience. It was a memorable day for all of them.

excerpt.rendered: Team Vistara celebrated the 90th anniversary of Mr. JRD Tata’s maiden flight by sharing their world with our children and helping them experience the ‘new feeling’ aboard the Delhi-Amritsar-Delhi flight […]
